resources.string: HackIT hackathons are a catalyst for innovation and strive to spark a moment of creativity for the sake of technology. They provide an atmosphere of thinking and concentration that allows individuals to take relevant business problems and go about solving them in a 24-hour period. Starting from the bare bones of an idea, the participants form teams and work through the night seeing it through to the end. At the end of the event, participants have the opportunity to present his or hers work to a distinguished panel of judges. Business-relevant exemplary ideas have the added benefit of possibly being implemented beyond the HackIT.
